title: Filthy word in Keen 1-3?
content:
I just found this quote from Tom Hall on a Keen history page, and I had a quick look but I can't find it - does anyone know where this is?

[quote]Quote:[hr]"Big secret: now it can be revealed! There is actually a filthy word somewhere in Keen 1-3, spelled in the Standard Galactic Alphabet, made of yellow platforms inside a field of red platforms. I won't say where, but the dedicated can find it... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Hee!"[hr][/quote]

title: Keen 3:
content:
That would be in Keen 3. I haven't found it yet, but it's there. You can see the levels in Keen 3 at www.commander-keen.com

I'll look there later.

-- NAJAWA --

title: hehe
content: Whoever spelled it fucled it up pretty bad, though.  :-)  It's in Keen2.

title: Re: hehe
content: Hmm...still can't find it.  CK2 level 10 looks like the most likely spot, but I still can't see any SGA [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

title: hmm
content: Here's a hint:  It's in [url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/maps/maps-k2-lvl11.html]Level 11[/url].  :-)

title: Um... E for everyone:
content:
I guess if they spelt it out; some more protective mothers just would let their children play it. Sorry, I really thought it was Keen 3. All that looking for NOTHING. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

Oh, well

title: Re: Um... E for everyone:
content:
"OH...well that is pretty well hidden, I never would've found that...I wonder what's with the 'L' - is it meant to be like that, or did they put in the wrong character by mistake?!"
The L was a mistake. Since K is right before L in the alphabets, they probably just accidentally looked wrong.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: buh
content:
How else COULD you pronounce it?

Fucled...

* Rhymes with "Knuckled"
* Pronounced like "Bugle"
* Emphasis on the 2nd syllable, Fyoo-KLED

I like Knuckled best, personally. I fucled it up! :-)
